testsuite.name: Scenario: Missing resource_link_id

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
When I go to the LTI Test Harness page
And I clear the LTI Test Harness form
And I fill the LTI Test Harness form with random data
And I clear the "resource_link_id" LTI field
And I launch prepared "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Administrator" and outcome URL "default" and document target "window"
Then I am on the LTI Test Harness Error page
And I see the LTI test harness error "Parameter resource_link_id is not set. Please contact your system administrator."
Then I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows
